channel.title: blog on KPI0's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in blog on KPI0's Blog

item.title: comments.html配置参考
item.description: 文件目录\HUGO\blog\layouts\partials\comments.html <div> <div class="pagination__title"> <span class="pagination__title-h" style="font-size: 20px;">评论&l

item.title: config.yaml配置参考
item.description: 生成的config.toml改为config.yaml 以下配置根据自己的需求更改 baseURL: "https://kpi0.github.io/" # 博客部署网址 title: KPI0's Blog # 网站标题(中间+底部) languageCode: zh-cn # en-us paginate: 10

item.title: search.html配置参考
item.description: 文件目录\HUGO\blog\layouts_default\search.html {{- define "main" }} <header class="page-header"> <h1>{{- (printf "%s&nbsp;" .Title ) | htmlUnescape -}} <!-- <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="28" height="28" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round">
